history.proof: intros. revert dependent n. induction m. - intros. inversion H. sfirstorder depth: 3use: plus_assoc, sum_n_n. - intros. destruct n. + reflexivity. + hauto l: on use: sum_n_m_Chasles, Nat.le_succ_diag_r, sum_n_n unfold: sum_n_m.

exceptions.tactic: intros G a m n H.
intros G' a m n H.
intros G' a' m n H.
intros G' a' m' n H.
intros G' a' m' n' H.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
The LHS of sum_n_n (sum_n_m _ _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of plus_assoc (plus _ (plus _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G m : nat IHm : forall n : nat, (n <= m)%nat -> sum_n_m a n m = plus (a n) (sum_n_m a (S n) m) n : nat H : (S n <= S m)%nat Unable to unify "plus (a (S n)) (sum_n_m a (S (S n)) (S m))" with "plus (plus (a (S n)) (sum_n_m a (S (S n)) m)) (a (S m))".

original: intros G a m n H. revert dependent n. induction m. - intros. inversion H. - intros. destruct n. + simpl. rewrite sum_n_n. reflexivity. + simpl. rewrite sum_n_Sm. rewrite IHm. rewrite plus_assoc. reflexivity.
